Exothermic Social

Online Connections

Facebook and Instagram

Check out our Facebook account here!

In addition to our shared Facebook account, every team also has their separate Instagram accounts. Visit each of our teams below!

  • Exothermic Actuation (10A)
  • Exothermic Blaze (10B)
  • Exothermic Creation (10C)
  • Exothermic Dusk (10D)
  • Exothermic Evolution (10E)
  • Exothermic Fusion (10F)
  • Exothermic Neon (10N)
  • Exothermic Excess (10X)

Youtube

Exothermic teams also have their separate Youtube channels where they post videos about the competitions they have attended, reveal videos of their robots, or any other content related to robotics. Visit their channels below!
